p: Human OS SaOS-2 (ATCC-HTB-85) and MNNG (ATCC-CRL-1547) cells were obtained from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC, Manassas, VA, USA) and cultured as described [ 71, 72, 73] in DMEM containing 10% v/v FBS, 100 mg/mL penicillin and 100 mg/mL streptomycin. Cultures were mainteined at 37 Â°C in a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2. Comparative analysis was performed with cell populations at the same generation.
